original_title: Thundershowers likely in several provinces & districts
original_body_lines: Thundershowers are expected would in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces and Galle and Matara districts, the Forecasting Division of the  National Meteorological Centre said

They said there could be showers in Central, Uva and Eastern provinces and Polonnaruwa district during the evening or in the night. Fairly heavy showers above 50mm are likely in Eastern and Uva provinces.
Therefore, the public are requested to take adequate precautionary measures to safeguard themselves from harm caused by sudden gusty winds and lightning during thundershowers.
Meanwhile, the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Kankesanthurai via Mannar and from Matara to Pottuvil via Hambantota will be fairly rough at times.

Winds would be south-westerly over sea area around the island and speed may increase up to 45 km/h at times in the sea areas off the coast extending from Puttalam to Kankesanthurai via Mannar and from Matara to Pottuvil via Hambantota. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
